About Me

BIO

Professional with over ten years of experience in analysis, data processing and business intelligence. I worked with performance indicators, finance, contracts, supply chain, quality control and people management. Always facing big challenges and taking on big responsibilities. Of these challenges, an invitation to analyze the company's contractual data stands out, in order to outline a strategy that would lead us to close a multi-million dollar contract with Petrobras. Where we were successful and conquered 60% of the onshore market in Brazil.

I have experience in the onshore and offshore petrochemical industry, retail and wholesale sales, civil construction and financial markets.
